name: USA Farming Simulator 3D: Pro Farm Tractor Drive
name_original: USA Farming Simulator 3D: Pro Farm Tractor Drive
description:
Step up in the shoes of countryside farmer life and play this virtual farm management game. Drive real tractor and farm machines like harvester, plower and seeder in open world environment! Play this newest farming simulator and enjoy real village farm life.

You have just received family heritage, a small holding of 250 acers. It’s up to you to keep the cattle and crop in the US city simulator. Turn it into a large holding 4x 250 acer with silage transportation, battery chicken coops and cow barns. Purchase giant silo for grain and seed storage. Grow your own organic food like fruits and vegetables. Sell them to city to earn money. Enjoy the mixed farming game of 2017 with organic food cultivation and harvesting as well as purchasing cattle livestock, breeding cow and bull cattle.
Plow your fields… Fertilize the soil, seed with complete water and insecticide spraying. Start the engine and feel the landscape as you roam in your tractors with realistic wheel physics power of huge trucks. Drive all the massive agricultural machines like variety of tractors, trailers, harvesters and water tankers to harvest crops. Purchase more plantation machines, harvester vehicles and cow cattle to start your very own dairy farms.

Features
• Highly detailed plantation machinery
• Plant crops like wheat, canola, corn
• H¬arvest sugar beet, soyabean and potatoes
• Use realistic tractor trailer, pickup trucks and water tanker.
• Agricultural simulator games have gone mobile!
• Realistic combine vehicles and machineries like plows, seeders
• Open-World environment with career mode
• USA and European maps
• Auto driving feature
• Steering Wheel, Buttons or Tilting controls

Enjoy the new farming game simulator playing in an open-world career mode to fulfil your harvesting dreams. Become a professional USA farmer with in this newest Farming Simulator of 2017.
